body_html: We can just create functions in that init file that log a warning and delegate to the actual function. Then in v1.o we remove the delegates. We'll need to refactor the internal codebase after the deprecation is added.
body_text: We can just create functions in that init file that log a warning and delegate to the actual function. Then in v1.o we remove the delegates. We'll need to refactor the internal codebase after the deprecation is added.
body: We can just create functions in that init file that log a warning and delegate to the actual function. Then in v1.o we remove the delegates. We'll need to refactor the internal codebase after the deprecation is added.
